backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles and appointment storage with access control and admin-only retrieval of all appointments.
feature_evidence.json: Report mapping implemented features to related frontend files, components, and test requirements with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each major frontend file including pages, components, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Root Tailwind base layer defining theme tokens and dark-mode variants for a custom OKLCH color system.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell providing the root mount point and loading the Vite React entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for public pages, booking flow, and admin appointments under a shared layout.
Client-side validated booking form that serializes inputs and submits appointment requests to the backend.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer showing business contact info, locations, quick links, and a caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive site header with logo, navigation links, smooth scrolling, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks to request appointments and fetch all appointments using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom light and dark theme variables for the app's color system.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that initializes React, React Query, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminAppointmen: Admin dashboard page that handles Internet Identity login and displays or restricts access to appointment data based on auth state.
frontend/src/pages/BookAppointmentPage.t: Page displaying a form to book an appointment along with steps explaining the followâ€‘up process.
frontend/src/pages/BookingSuccessPage.ts: Success page confirming an appointment request with next steps and navigation buttons.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with hero content, service listings, pricing, and navigation to booking or service details.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing features, requirements, and assets for the Doctor Phone Repair website and admin functionality.
